${ModID}:Accelerate.NAME: Accelerate
${ModID}:Accelerate.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, shuffle a *Mach Punch into your draw pile.
${ModID}:Accelerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, shuffle a *Mach Punch+ into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
${ModID}:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, apply !M! ${ModID}:Exposed to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Assault.NAME: Assault
${ModID}:Assault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! *Mach Punches into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Backswing.NAME: Backswing
${ModID}:Backswing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:BagOfTricks.NAME: Bag of Tricks
${ModID}:BagOfTricks.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Attacks to add into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:BagOfTricks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Attacks to add into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BloodRite.NAME: Blood Rite
${ModID}:BloodRite.DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks deal additional damage equal to {!M!|>1=!M! times }{@@}their target's Vulnerable.

${ModID}:BoltStrike.NAME: Bolt Strike
${ModID}:BoltStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Charged affects this card !M! times.

${ModID}:Bulwark.NAME: Bulwark
${ModID}:Bulwark.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If both adjacent cards are Attacks, return this to your hand.

${ModID}:Bunker.NAME: Bunker
${ModID}:Bunker.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade adjacent cards.

${ModID}:Burnout.NAME: Burnout
${ModID}:Burnout.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust adjacent cards. NL Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:Condense.NAME: Condense
${ModID}:Condense.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is created during combat, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}.

${ModID}:DescentOfDarkness.NAME: Descent of Darkness
${ModID}:DescentOfDarkness.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL If this would deal !${ModID}:M2! or less unblocked damage, increase it to !${ModID}:M3!.

${ModID}:Dominate.NAME: Dominate
${ModID}:Dominate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [E] for each enemy with Vulnerable.

${ModID}:DoubleEdged.NAME: Double Edged
${ModID}:DoubleEdged.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Sheathe a copy of the last Attack played this combat. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:DoubleEdged.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Sheathe a copy of the last Attack played this combat.

${ModID}:Dragonheart.NAME: Dragonheart
${ModID}:Dragonheart.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is created during combat, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:DragonPunch.NAME: Dragon Punch
${ModID}:DragonPunch.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Electrify.NAME: Electrify
${ModID}:Electrify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Charged. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

${ModID}:Feint.NAME: Feint
${ModID}:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Charged. NL Ignores Block.

${ModID}:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
${ModID}:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
${ModID}:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and ${ModID}:Exposed to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FromBeyond.NAME: From Beyond
${ModID}:FromBeyond.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Sheathe a card in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Grappler.NAME: Grappler
${ModID}:Grappler.DESCRIPTION: Give adjacent cards ${ModID}:Grab this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GravityHammer.NAME: Gravity Hammer
${ModID}:GravityHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!X damage. NL Deal equal damage to adjacent enemies.

${ModID}:Haunted.NAME: Haunted
${ModID}:Haunted.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Voices into your hand.

${ModID}:Heroics.NAME: Heroics
${ModID}:Heroics.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw cards, increase the amount you draw by !M!.

${ModID}:Iaido.NAME: Iaido
${ModID}:Iaido.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Sheathe all Attacks in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:IAmAbove.NAME: I Am Above
${ModID}:IAmAbove.DESCRIPTION: You may pay for cards with HP if you do not have enough Energy.

${ModID}:InTheDark.NAME: In The Dark
${ModID}:InTheDark.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Voices into your hand.
${ModID}:InTheDark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a *Voices into your hand.

${ModID}:InvokeTheMind.NAME: Invoke The Mind
${ModID}:InvokeTheMind.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Shuffle an *Invoke The Body into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:InvokeTheBody.NAME: Invoke The Body
${ModID}:InvokeTheBody.DESCRIPTION: Gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}. NL Shuffle an *Invoke The Spirit into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:InvokeTheSpirit.NAME: Invoke The Spirit
${ModID}:InvokeTheSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle an *Invoke The Mind into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:KneeSmash.NAME: Knee Smash
${ModID}:KneeSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals double damage to enemies with Vulnerable.

${ModID}:LeapOfFaith.NAME: Leap of Faith
${ModID}:LeapOfFaith.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Rearrange your hand.

${ModID}:LightningPalm.NAME: Lightning Palm
${ModID}:LightningPalm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Charged. NL Add !M! *Mach Punches into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MachPunch.NAME: Mach Punch
${ModID}:MachPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MartialForm.NAME: Martial Form
${ModID}:MartialForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, ${ModID}:Sheathe a card in your hand.
${ModID}:MartialForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, ${ModID}:Sheathe a card in your hand.

${ModID}:OffensiveGuard.NAME: Offensive Guard
${ModID}:OffensiveGuard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you fully Block an Attack, gain !M! ${ModID}:Charged.

${ModID}:Overexertion.NAME: Overexertion
${ModID}:Overexertion.DESCRIPTION: Gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Shuffle a *Dazed into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Parry.NAME: Parry
${ModID}:Parry.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block for each ${ModID}:Sheathed card.

${ModID}:PlanAhead.NAME: Plan Ahead
${ModID}:PlanAhead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Rearrange your hand.

${ModID}:PowerShot.NAME: Power Shot
${ModID}:PowerShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 0 if adjacent to a Power.

${ModID}:PreemptiveStrike.NAME: Preemptive Strike
${ModID}:PreemptiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If an adjacent card is an Attack, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}.

${ModID}:Puncture.NAME: Puncture
${ModID}:Puncture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable

${ModID}:QiBlast.NAME: Qi Blast
${ModID}:QiBlast.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:Rally.NAME: Rally
${ModID}:Rally.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Charged. NL Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}. NL Discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:RollingPunch.NAME: Rolling Punch
${ModID}:RollingPunch.DESCRIPTION: stslib:Persist !stslib:persist!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you already played Rolling Punch this turn, shuffle a *Dragon Punch into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Sanctuary.NAME: Sanctuary
${ModID}:Sanctuary.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL While held, adjacent cards will not Exhaust on play.

${ModID}:ShapedByFire.NAME: Shaped By Fire
${ModID}:ShapedByFire.DESCRIPTION: Gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}. NL Add a *Burn into your hand.

${ModID}:Shatter.NAME: Shatter
${ModID}:Shatter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply ${ModID}:Exposed equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:SliceAndDice.NAME: Slice and Dice
${ModID}:SliceAndDice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat at half damage. NL Repeat at quarter damage twice.

${ModID}:Subjugate.NAME: Subjugate
${ModID}:Subjugate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When this enemy dies, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand to 0 this combat.

${ModID}:Subterfuge.NAME: Subterfuge
${ModID}:Subterfuge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Sheathe a card in your hand.

${ModID}:Sweep.NAME: Sweep
${ModID}:Sweep.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Enemies larger than you are hit twice.

${ModID}:Throw.NAME: Throw
${ModID}:Throw.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL The next Attack you play costs 0.

${ModID}:TormentedSpirit.NAME: Tormented Spirit
${ModID}:TormentedSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Deals additional damage for each card in your exhaust pile.

${ModID}:TripleStrike.NAME: Triple Strike
${ModID}:TripleStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Increase this card's hits by 1 this combat.

${ModID}:Truesight.NAME: Truesight
${ModID}:Truesight.DESCRIPTION: Give adjacent cards ${ModID}:Combo this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Unleash.NAME: Unleash
${ModID}:Unleash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This turn, your next Attack is played twice. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Unleash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This turn, your next Attack is played twice.

${ModID}:Voices.NAME: Voices
${ModID}:Voices.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Discard 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Warstrike.NAME: Warstrike
${ModID}:Warstrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL If the enemy already had Vulnerable, apply !M! Weak.
